name: anastasiapiano
testimonial: Kian was a high-level professional, with a personal style (that's why I chose him from all available sellers). He met all my needs and requirements and responded on time. He was patient with all my notes, kept asking until he understood what I was asking for or requesting, integrated his own ideas which helped me and gave me a clearer view of what I wanted and needed, took initiative, and delivered by bringing fresh ideas. He paid close attention to details and never complained. He was always trying to figure out the product I was imagining in my head and how he could design and produce it. I highly recommend him!

name: garrieramos
testimonial: Amazing. Met all my needs and did it so fast as well. 100% Recommend
